projects.title: Waterproof Towels
projects.description: Tired of your towels always getting wet when you use them. Now, with our patented hydrophobic 'technology', kiss those wet towel blues goodbye!

projects.title: My Great Movie
projects.description: A gripping and informative documentary on the creation and distribution of khaki pants!

projects.title: Turtle Rescue
projects.description: Too many turtles are anguishing on the streets of Detroit. Help us put an end to the stray turtle plight!
